alert.note: Alert for Cook; DuPage; Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 6:30PM CDT until July 05 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL WILL...SOUTHEASTERN DUPAGE AND SOUTHEASTERN COOK COUNTIES... At 630 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Chicago Ridge to Orland Park to near Mokena, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Chicago, Joliet, Hammond, Orland Park, Tinley Park, Oak Lawn, Romeoville, Calumet City, Woodridge, Chicago Heights, South Shore, Roseland, Chicago Lawn, Englewood, Burbank, Lansing, Oak Forest, Harvey, Lockport and New Lenox. This includes... Argonne National Laboratory, SeatGeek Stadium, University of St. Francis, Windy City Thunderbolts Baseball, Chicagoland Speedway...Route 66 Raceway, Hollywood Casino Amphitheatre, Governors State University, Joliet Slammers Baseball, Lewis University, Moraine Valley Community College, Prairie State College, and South Suburban College. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
